divs: Sighting DetailsI decided to take some pictures of the clouds yesterday evening because of the tornado watches that where out all over the area. The clouds just had a different look and were moving fast. I took several pictures with my Cannon PowerShot A410 and in this particular picture I noticed that right before a took the shot that a bright white light showed up on the screen of my digital camera. I took the picture and moved the camera to see what made the light and there was nothing there. I looked through the screen again in the same spot and nothing. This is the second UFO sighting I have had in the last week and half. My other report is in Event ID #16554. Now I think I have finally seen a daytime UFO. The picture has a bright white light at the bottom (above the tree) when zoomed in on you can definitely see a bright white center with a black ring around it and it seems to have somewhat of a square outer layer. This picture was taken at 7:48 pm facing northeast. There is definitely alot of UFO activity going on in my area in the last year!
trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Roanoke
There were no other sightings in Roanoke on or around April 20th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Circular UFO with bright white in center with black ring around it appeared in picture.
